name: Peanut
Technical_Specifications:
Technical Specifications

  • Product Type: SPC Rigid Core Vinyl Plank
  • Total Thickness: 5.0 mm (including underlayment)
  • Wear Layer: 20 mils (0.5 mm)
  • Surface Finish: Deep Embossed Texture
  • Installation: Unilin Click System (no glue)
  • UV Coating: Yes
  • Underlayment: 1.0 mm IXPE (pre-attached)
  • Board Size: 7” x 48”
  • Coverage per Carton: 23.896 sqft
  • Truckload Weight: 44,000 lbs
  • Price: $1.69 / sqft
Ke_Benefits:
Key Benefits

  • Waterproof: Perfect for kitchens, bathrooms, and laundry rooms
  • Slip Resistant: Enhanced surface safety
  • 20 mil Wear Layer: Ideal for everyday residential traffic
  • UV Coating: Protects color and finish over time
  • IXPE Pad: Basic acoustic insulation and softer step
  • Click Lock: Quick installation, no adhesives required
  • Easy to Clean: Minimal maintenance required
Recommended_Use_Areas:
Recommended Use Areas

  • Bedrooms, living rooms, dining areas
  • Budget-conscious remodeling projects
  • Rental properties needing quick turnover
  • Light commercial applications
Logistics:
Logistics

  • Pallet Coverage: 1,194.80 sqft
  • Truckload Coverage: 23,896.00 sqft
  • Truckload Weight: 44,000 lbs
  • Delivery: Available in Orlando and surrounding areas
  • Installation: Optional professional service available
